name: github1s-overlay-chrome-extension
description: Allow open https://github1s.com viewer into a overlay iframe into Github
author: Dimas LÃ³pez Zurita (dimaslz) | me@dimaslz.io

scripts.watch: NODE_ENV=development && cp src/manifest.json dist/ && parcel watch --no-hmr src/{background.js,script.js}
scripts.build: cp src/manifest.json dist/ && parcel build src/{background.js,script.js}
